Blue seas, clear skies, and a blistering battle await at the Bayside Battleground! With Astra and Umbra scrambling to navigate narrow piers, newcome pups and Wolves' Den regulars alike must rely upon their wits to triumph on the Turali shore.

At the end of the crystal line, who will stand victorious? Will it be you?
